name: Tales of the Dice Land
description:
Tales of the Dice Land is a Multiplayer Tactic RPG where the DICE chooses the character you'll be playing with while you choose what they'll do. Count on your luck to make the best decisions and, if it's on your side, you might even get some extra reward... 

Controls

Mouse - does everything

Credits

Programming, Art, Game Design - @lutd_c
